summary: The diff indicates that CareersPage.tsx has been modified to include JSON-LD structured data, but the implementation uses a useEffect hook to inject the script tag into the document head rather than placing it directly in the component's JSX return using dangerouslySetInnerHTML as required by REQ-9. The file summary explicitly states 'Preserves the existing schema.org JobPosting JSON-LD structured data script tag injected via useEffect' and the truncated note confirms it uses a useEffect hook injecting into document head. REQ-9 specifically requires the script tag to be rendered directly in the JSX return via dangerouslySetInnerHTML, not injected imperatively via useEffect. Additionally, Header.tsx was also modified (Careers navigate call pattern changed), which violates the constraint of only modifying CareersPage.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Inject the JSON-LD script tag directly in the component's JSX return as a <script type='application/ld+json'> tag using dangerouslySetInnerHTML (not via useEffect or imperative DOM manipulation).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary explicitly states the implementation uses a useEffect hook to inject the script tag into the document head, not as a JSX element with dangerouslySetInnerHTML in the component's return statement as required.

hallucinated_features.description: Header.tsx was modified to change the Careers navigate call pattern (removing the 'as any' cast).
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly constrains that only frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx may be modified and forbids modifying Header.tsx or any other component. The diff summary shows Header.tsx was modified.
